p: Laboratory data (hemoglobin; white blood cell and platelet counts; and blood urea nitrogen, serum creatinine, and glucose levels) were collected for all patients prior to infusion (1â€“7 days) and on days 1, 7, and 30 after infusion. Arterial blood gases were obtained prior to infusion and on days 7 and 30 after infusion. Spirometric values were obtained within 7 days prior to infusion, just before infusion, and on days 1, 7, and 30 after infusion.
